Authors and Citation

Authors

  • Zhengjia Wang. Author, maintainer, copyright holder.

  • John Magnotti. Contributor, researcher.

  • Xiang Zhang. Contributor, researcher.

  • Brian Metzger. Researcher.

  • Elizabeth Nesbitt. Researcher.

  • Meng Li. Thesis advisor.

  • Michael Beauchamp. Thesis advisor, contributor, data contributor.
